MyPage.SetNotificationSubMsg:
If you set your notification settings to Off, 
 you cannot receive push notifications related to successful wire transfers, failures, or refunds.
MyPage.removeAccountSubMsg:
All wire transfer/transaction details, including 
 your personal information will be deleted, 
 and the deleted information cannot be restored.
MyPage.removeAccountDoneMsg:
Your PASS membership has 
 successfully been canceled.
MyPage.removeAccountFailMsg:
You cannot cancel your membership 
 because a wire transfer is currently in progress 
 or there is a remaining refund amount. 
 
 Check PASS Usage History.

Refund.RCauText_a: en-보낸사람이 입력한 이름과 입력하신 은행계좌의 예금주가 일치하지 않는 경우, 송금액을 받으실 수 없습니다.
Refund.RCauText_b: en-보낸사람이 송금한 시점으로부터 24시간이 지난 경우 송금액을 수령하실 수 없습니다.
Refund.RCauText_c: en-은행 점검시간에 받는 경우, 점검 이후 입력하신 계좌로 입금이 진행 됩니다.
